alert.note: Alert for Creek (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 05 at 1:58PM CDT until May 06 at 11:10AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Forecast flooding changed from Minor to Moderate severity and increased in duration for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Polecat Creek near Sapulpa affecting Creek County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Polecat Creek near Sapulpa. * WHEN...Until late tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 26.0 feet, moderate flooding affects pasturelands and suburban roads between Sapulpa and Jenks. Livestock barns and other outbuildings are flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:32 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 26.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 27.0 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage late tonight. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
